name: Raser
description:
2

2D Racing Game

Endless Mode (prototype)

3 Lvls (more coming soon)

Left Mouse Click  or Space-> Move forward or rotate in the air

Right Mouse Click -> Move backward or rotate backwards

Left Shift -> "Slow Motion"

Q -> "Instant Death"

Escape -> Pause Menu

Adjust Music Volume -> R=+ , F=-  (only works while playing, NOT in main menu)

Other Keys are explained in the Game
